S.FORM: == Li-ang-ha-te. Yu-la李昂哈德·尤拉 == nikaudip生平 sumamad i Zuy-se "caypic seppic – caypic tupic" 早年於瑞士(1707-1727) caypic seppic mihcaan sepat a bulat caylim dimiad, Li-ang-ha-te. Yu-la pilecuhan i Zuy-se-pa-e-say, ci ama ni Paw-lu. Yu-la u kilisetu nu cia-e-wen-cun a buksi, wina ci Ma-ke-li-te'.Pu-lu-ke', u tuas nuheni yadah ku sitangahay a Ku-tan-sye-ce. sakasepat ci Yu-la ni lecuhan a sakakaay nu tatamaan, tatusa ku sabana nida ci An-na-ma-li-ya atu Ma-li-ya. Ma-ke-ta-lay-na, idaw henay ku saba ci Ye-han. hay-in-li-si. caay ka teneng ni lecuhan ci Yu-li, mabulaw ku nuheni namaka Pa-say-e katukuh i inakaan a Li-n, itida satu ci Yu-la a maudip nu wawaan. 1707年4月15日, . nanuwawa, ci Yu-la namaka ci amaan nida micapi atu minanam tu susye, ci yama nida natayda i Pa-e tabakiay a cacudadan minanam tu Zuy-se su-sye-cia ci Ya-ke-pu'.Puo-nu-li a cudadan. i waluay henay ku mihcaan, ci Yu-la tlumaen nida i Pa-e-say a bai nu lumaan mueneng, sa micuda tu tidaay a La-tin cacudadan. palawpesen nu cacudadan ku su-sye pinanaman, ci ama nida wananan nida ku manamuhay tu su-sye a sininga ci Ye-han-nie-se mala papasubana' tu su-sye ci nidaan. . caypic tusep mihcaan, caylu a mihcaan ni Yu-la micumud tu Pa-say-e tabakiay nu cacudadan minanam, hatidaay nu mihcaan inai' ku micudaday tu tabakiay a cacudadan. mangalay ci ama nida tu ci Yu-laan muculil tu naculilan nida, malabuksi, yukiwan ni ama nida, micuda ci Yu-la u sakay sen-sye ku cudadan nida, Si-la-yi atu Si-pu-lay-yi. 1720年,13 . caypic tulim mihcaan, ci Ye-han.puoneli a tusaay nu tatamaan a wawa ci Ni-ku-la.Puo-nu-li "sakakaay" atu Dan-ji-e. Puo-nu-li "sakatusa a wawa"mmicukud i Sen-pi-de-paw a E'-Kuo-hu-cia kesyeyun mikuli. tawya u nuheni mihusiw ci Yu-laan, anuidaw ku kakulian, papatayni hantu nu niyam ci Yu-la itini mikuli. caypic tunem mihcaan pitu a bulat lucay a demiad, ci Ni-ku-la mamuciw mapatay, cacay a mihcaan ci nida i tida. caypic tupic mihcaan lima a bulat caypic a dimiad, makatuku ci Yu-la i Sen-pi-de-paw, caay ka tenes namaka padekuan a misakakawaw alaw tapabaw tayda i susye a kitidaan misakakawaw. mapulung cinida atu ci Dan-ni-e mueneng, maladay tu a tatusa misakakawaw. ci Yu-la amelik matineng tu tu E'-YI, mananamtu tu itidaay a nikaudip, tawya sikawaw aca ci nida tu E'-kuo nu kayngu a misaydan. caypic lusep mihcaan ci Pi-de ese mapatay, nikalingesan cinidaan sinikakapahan tu. ci Yu-la itida i cacudadan kasenu' satu a tapabaw, itida i caypic lucay a mihcaan mala wulisye sadan ku kawaw nida. miliyas cinida tu E'-kuo nu kayguan, kaiyan nida mala sakakaay. nikudan nu tusaay a mihcaan, ci Dan-ni-e. puo-nu-li malibut tu ci nida i Sen-pi-de-paw tu nikaada nutaw i cinidaan, mutikuaca tayda i Pa-say-e, ci Yu-la malasusye a cozen. 1730 . caypic lusip mihcaan cacay a bulat pitu a demiad, ci Yu-la atu Zuy-se mikulitay ci Ke-aw-e-ke. Ke-say-e a tataynaan a wawaw ci Kay-sa-lin-na. Ke-e-say mikikun, micakay ku nuheni tatusa tu luma' i Nei-wa sadipasan, sabaw tulu ku nilecuhan nuheni tu wawaw, tatulu ku tatamaan atu tatusa ku tataynaan a wawaw nuheni katuku tu balaki ku nikaudip. 1734年1月7日, . nikamenuan, caypic piccay mihcaan idaw ku picidekan nu heni a kawawan, makatuduh ku luma' ni Yu-la mami matuduh ku cancanan nai' ku liwanliwanaca, ku adidi mapatay, nika, nisulitan ni Yu-la tumian idaw henay, duma u nisulidan tu sakay bunacan a cudadan adidi ku malawpesay, hanidatengan nu tada punuan, alaw mahedek nida kina kalepilepian nu matuduhay a cudadan. . caypic piclu mihcaan, sayaway ni Yu-la a acawa ci Kay-sa-lin-na mapatay. sa siacawaw ci Yu-la, caypic picnem mihcaan, cinida atu sakacaay kalecad nu winaan a sabaan nu acawanida ci Sa-le-mea. A-pi-kay-e.Ke-say-e mikiku. katukuh nikapatay. 1773年, .

== Li-ang-ha-te. Yo-la李昂哈德·尤拉 == nikaodip生平 somamad i Zoy-se "caypic seppic – caypic topic" 早年於瑞士(1707-1727) caypic seppic mihcaan sepat a bolat caylim dimiad, Li-ang-ha-te. Yo-la pilecohan i Zoy-se-pa-e-say, ci ama ni Paw-lo. Yo-la o kiliseto no cia-e-wen-con a boksi, wina ci Ma-ke-li-te'.Po-lo-ke', o toas noheni yadah ko sitangahay a Ko-tan-sye-ce. sakasepat ci Yo-la ni lecohan a sakakaay no tatamaan, tatosa ko sabana nida ci An-na-ma-li-ya ato Ma-li-ya. Ma-ke-ta-lay-na, idaw henay ko saba ci Ye-han. hay-in-li-si. caay ka teneng ni lecohan ci Yo-li, mabolaw ko noheni namaka Pa-say-e katokoh i inakaan a Li-n, itida sato ci Yo-la a maodip no wawaan. 1707年4月15日, . nanowawa, ci Yo-la namaka ci amaan nida micapi ato minanam to sosye, ci yama nida natayda i Pa-e tabakiay a cacodadan minanam to Zoy-se so-sye-cia ci Ya-ke-po'.Poo-no-li a codadan. i waloay henay ko mihcaan, ci Yo-la tlomaen nida i Pa-e-say a bai no lomaan moeneng, sa micoda to tidaay a La-tin cacodadan. palawpesen no cacodadan ko so-sye pinanaman, ci ama nida wananan nida ko manamohay to so-sye a sininga ci Ye-han-nie-se mala papasobana' to so-sye ci nidaan. . caypic tosep mihcaan, caylo a mihcaan ni Yo-la micomod to Pa-say-e tabakiay no cacodadan minanam, hatidaay no mihcaan inai' ko micodaday to tabakiay a cacodadan. mangalay ci ama nida to ci Yo-laan mocolil to nacolilan nida, malaboksi, yokiwan ni ama nida, micoda ci Yo-la o sakay sen-sye ko codadan nida, Si-la-yi ato Si-po-lay-yi. 1720年,13 . caypic tolim mihcaan, ci Ye-han.pooneli a tosaay no tatamaan a wawa ci Ni-ko-la.Poo-no-li "sakakaay" ato Dan-ji-e. Poo-no-li "sakatosa a wawa"mmicokod i Sen-pi-de-paw a E'-Koo-ho-cia kesyeyon mikoli. tawya o noheni mihosiw ci Yo-laan, anoidaw ko kakolian, papatayni hanto no niyam ci Yo-la itini mikoli. caypic tonem mihcaan pito a bolat locay a demiad, ci Ni-ko-la mamociw mapatay, cacay a mihcaan ci nida i tida. caypic topic mihcaan lima a bolat caypic a dimiad, makatoko ci Yo-la i Sen-pi-de-paw, caay ka tenes namaka padekoan a misakakawaw alaw tapabaw tayda i sosye a kitidaan misakakawaw. mapolong cinida ato ci Dan-ni-e moeneng, maladay to a tatosa misakakawaw. ci Yo-la amelik matineng to to E'-YI, mananamto to itidaay a nikaodip, tawya sikawaw aca ci nida to E'-koo no kayngo a misaydan. caypic losep mihcaan ci Pi-de ese mapatay, nikalingesan cinidaan sinikakapahan to. ci Yo-la itida i cacodadan kaseno' sato a tapabaw, itida i caypic locay a mihcaan mala wolisye sadan ko kawaw nida. miliyas cinida to E'-koo no kaygoan, kaiyan nida mala sakakaay. nikodan no tosaay a mihcaan, ci Dan-ni-e. poo-no-li malibot to ci nida i Sen-pi-de-paw to nikaada notaw i cinidaan, motikoaca tayda i Pa-say-e, ci Yo-la malasosye a cozen. 1730 . caypic losip mihcaan cacay a bolat pito a demiad, ci Yo-la ato Zoy-se mikolitay ci Ke-aw-e-ke. Ke-say-e a tataynaan a wawaw ci Kay-sa-lin-na. Ke-e-say mikikon, micakay ko noheni tatosa to loma' i Nei-wa sadipasan, sabaw tolo ko nilecohan noheni to wawaw, tatolo ko tatamaan ato tatosa ko tataynaan a wawaw noheni katoko to balaki ko nikaodip. 1734年1月7日, . nikamenoan, caypic piccay mihcaan idaw ko picidekan no heni a kawawan, makatodoh ko loma' ni Yo-la mami matodoh ko cancanan nai' ko liwanliwanaca, ko adidi mapatay, nika, nisolitan ni Yo-la tomian idaw henay, doma o nisolidan to sakay bonacan a codadan adidi ko malawpesay, hanidatengan no tada ponoan, alaw mahedek nida kina kalepilepian no matodohay a codadan. . caypic piclo mihcaan, sayaway ni Yo-la a acawa ci Kay-sa-lin-na mapatay. sa siacawaw ci Yo-la, caypic picnem mihcaan, cinida ato sakacaay kalecad no winaan a sabaan no acawanida ci Sa-le-mea. A-pi-kay-e.Ke-say-e mikiko. katokoh nikapatay. 1773年, .
